item.title: Intelligence
item.description: A CIA agent goes rogue with very important information from the CIA, which results in the death of a M.I 6 agent. When Gabriel is brought to the case they find out that Mei Chen is able to hack into his head.

shorttext.p: A CIA agent goes rogue with very important information from the CIA, which results in the death of a M.I 6 agent. When Gabriel is brought to the case they find out that Mei Chen is able to hack into his head.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: The mirakuru sends Roy into an uncontrollable rage and he unleashes on the city. Oliver realizes the mirakuru has taken over Roy completely and must figure out a way to stop him. Sara declares thatthe only way to stop him is to kill him.

shorttext.p: The mirakuru sends Roy into an uncontrollable rage and he unleashes on the city. Oliver realizes the mirakuru has taken over Roy completely and must figure out a way to stop him. Sara declares thatthe only way to stop him is to kill him.

item.title: The Walking Dead
item.description: Rick begins to see visions of Lori and asks Hershel for help. The Governor plans an assault on the prison. Daryl and Merle defend for themselves out in the forest while Hershel's health continues to deteriorate.

shorttext.p: Rick begins to see visions of Lori and asks Hershel for help. The Governor plans an assault on the prison. Daryl and Merle defend for themselves out in the forest while Hershel's health continues to deteriorate.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

shorttext.p: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

item.title: House of Cards
item.description: Congressman Francis Underwood has been declined the chair for Secretary of State. He's now gathering his own team to plot his revenge. Zoe Barnes, a reporter for the Washington Herald, will do anything to get her big break.

shorttext.p: Congressman Francis Underwood has been declined the chair for Secretary of State. He's now gathering his own team to plot his revenge. Zoe Barnes, a reporter for the Washington Herald, will do anything to get her big break.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother
item.description: When Robin and Loretta's conflict escalates, Barney is caught in the middle. Meanwhile, Marshall and Daphne deal with a stowaway on their road trip, and Ted and Cassie try to enjoy a trip to a lighthouse.

shorttext.p: When Robin and Loretta's conflict escalates, Barney is caught in the middle. Meanwhile, Marshall and Daphne deal with a stowaway on their road trip, and Ted and Cassie try to enjoy a trip to a lighthouse.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt discovers Jesse broke into his house and attempted to burn it down. Walt wants to protect his family so he moves them into a hotel for a few nights. Jesse decides to work with Hank in order to take down Walt.

shorttext.p: Walt discovers Jesse broke into his house and attempted to burn it down. Walt wants to protect his family so he moves them into a hotel for a few nights. Jesse decides to work with Hank in order to take down Walt.

item.title: Falling Skies
item.description: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

shorttext.p: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

item.title: Gotham
item.description: A new recruit in Captain Sarah Essen's Gotham City Police Department, Detective James Gordon is paired with Harvey Bullock to solve one of Gotham's most high-profile cases ever: the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne.

shorttext.p: A new recruit in Captain Sarah Essen's Gotham City Police Department, Detective James Gordon is paired with Harvey Bullock to solve one of Gotham's most high-profile cases ever: the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt and Jesse try to up their game by making more of the crystal every week for Tuco. Unfortunately, some of the ingredients they need is not easy to find. Meanwhile, Skyler realizes that her sister is a shoplifter.

shorttext.p: Walt and Jesse try to up their game by making more of the crystal every week for Tuco. Unfortunately, some of the ingredients they need is not easy to find. Meanwhile, Skyler realizes that her sister is a shoplifter.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description: Tyrion is arrested for the murder of Joffery and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town. The Night's Watch finds themselves in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

shorttext.p: Tyrion is arrested for the murder of Joffery and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town. The Night's Watch finds themselves in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

item.title: Once Upon a Time
item.description: As Henry's life hangs in the balance, the race is on to stop Pan from gaining full power from the heart of the truest believer. Back in Storybrooke of the past, Regina decides to fill a void in her life and sets out to adopt a baby.

shorttext.p: As Henry's life hangs in the balance, the race is on to stop Pan from gaining full power from the heart of the truest believer. Back in Storybrooke of the past, Regina decides to fill a void in her life and sets out to adopt a baby.

item.title: Shameless
item.series: Season 3, Ep. 7: A Long Way from Home
item.description: Frank and Fiona go to extreme lengths in court to claim sole custody of the kids. While Hymie's family arrives to take their son from Sheila and Jody, while Fiona starts a new job and a new romance.

shorttext.p: Season 3, Ep. 7: A Long Way from Home
Frank and Fiona go to extreme lengths in court to claim sole custody of the kids. While Hymie's family arrives to take their son from Sheila and Jody, while Fiona starts a new job and a new romance.

item.description: The Russian and US Presidents are set to sign an anti-terror treaty when assassinations rock Los Angeles, a call from a distressed Chloe forces Jack into action and President Logan's wife believes there may be a conspiracy.

shorttext.p: The Russian and US Presidents are set to sign an anti-terror treaty when assassinations rock Los Angeles, a call from a distressed Chloe forces Jack into action and President Logan's wife believes there may be a conspiracy.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: Peter Declan has been charged with murdering his wife, and only Oliver believes he's innocent. Arrow asks Laurel to look into Declan's case. Meanwhile, Walter investigates a warehouse that Moria mysteriously bought with the company's money.

shorttext.p: Peter Declan has been charged with murdering his wife, and only Oliver believes he's innocent. Arrow asks Laurel to look into Declan's case. Meanwhile, Walter investigates a warehouse that Moria mysteriously bought with the company's money.

item.title: The 100
item.description: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

shorttext.p: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

item.title: Pretty Little Liars
item.description: Shana tells Emily that she has a message from Ali, but can Emily and the girls trust Shana with all that they know about her? And when Shana ups the stakes and says that Ali wants to meet Emily could it all be part of it.

shorttext.p: Shana tells Emily that she has a message from Ali, but can Emily and the girls trust Shana with all that they know about her? And when Shana ups the stakes and says that Ali wants to meet Emily could it all be part of it.

item.title: Tyrant
item.description: On the verge of betraying and displacing Jamal, Barry receives troublesome news that threatens to destroy everything he's worked so hard for. Jamal's rising suspicions lead him to question the loyalty of those closest to him.

shorttext.p: On the verge of betraying and displacing Jamal, Barry receives troublesome news that threatens to destroy everything he's worked so hard for. Jamal's rising suspicions lead him to question the loyalty of those closest to him.

item.title: Shameless
item.series: Season 4, Ep. 4: Strangers on a Train
item.description: Fiona continues her secret affair with Robbie. The situation nearly boils over, when Mike shows up at Robbie's apartment while Fiona's inside. Fiona is able to hide just in time before her infidelity can be exposed.

shorttext.p: Season 4, Ep. 4: Strangers on a Train

Fiona continues her secret affair with Robbie. The situation nearly boils over, when Mike shows up at Robbie's apartment while Fiona's inside. Fiona is able to hide just in time before her infidelity can be exposed.

item.description: Naomi helps Jordan's sister, Elizabeth, out of a messy political situation, and in turn makes a deal with his mother. Teddy returns to Beverly Hills after Dixon tells him that Michela has gone missing and asks him to find her.

shorttext.p: Naomi helps Jordan's sister, Elizabeth, out of a messy political situation, and in turn makes a deal with his mother. Teddy returns to Beverly Hills after Dixon tells him that Michela has gone missing and asks him to find her.

item.title: Once Upon a Time
item.description: David must choose between staying with Kathryn or leaving her to be with Mary Margaret, with whom he's fallen deeply in love. Meanwhile, Prince Charming is about to encounter a life-changing event that will forever alter his destiny.

shorttext.p: David must choose between staying with Kathryn or leaving her to be with Mary Margaret, with whom he's fallen deeply in love. Meanwhile, Prince Charming is about to encounter a life-changing event that will forever alter his destiny.

item.title: The Big Bang Theory
item.description: The guys are stranded in the middle of nowhere when Leonard's car is stolen on the way to the Bakersfield Comic-Con. Back home, the girls try to figure out why the guys are so fascinated with comic books.

shorttext.p: The guys are stranded in the middle of nowhere when Leonard's car is stolen on the way to the Bakersfield Comic-Con. Back home, the girls try to figure out why the guys are so fascinated with comic books.

item.title: Continuum
item.description: Keira Cameron's world has disintegrated. Alec Sadler betrayed her chance of going back to 2077, using the time travel device in hope of saving his girlfriend. Now Kiera & Liber8, prisoners of the Freelancers scramble to escape their grasp.

shorttext.p: Keira Cameron's world has disintegrated. Alec Sadler betrayed her chance of going back to 2077, using the time travel device in hope of saving his girlfriend. Now Kiera & Liber8, prisoners of the Freelancers scramble to escape their grasp.

item.title: Vikings
item.description: Ragnar returns to England this time with Earl Haraldson's permission on condition that he includes Knut as part of the crew. On arrival, they are met by armed troops and Ragnar is inclined to accept their offer to accompany them.

shorttext.p: Ragnar returns to England this time with Earl Haraldson's permission on condition that he includes Knut as part of the crew. On arrival, they are met by armed troops and Ragnar is inclined to accept their offer to accompany them.

item.title: Falling Skies
item.description: Tom and the 2nd Mass hatch an elaborate plan to escape the confines of the Espheni Ghetto. Meanwhile back in Chinatown, after learning from Ben that Lexi has been keeping a deadly secret, Maggie confronts Lexi publicly.

shorttext.p: Tom and the 2nd Mass hatch an elaborate plan to escape the confines of the Espheni Ghetto. Meanwhile back in Chinatown, after learning from Ben that Lexi has been keeping a deadly secret, Maggie confronts Lexi publicly.

item.title: Outlander
item.description: Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy. Learning that the year is 1743, she tries to arrange travel back to the standing stones. Colum MacKenzie uses her ability as a healer as an excuse to detain her.

shorttext.p: Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy. Learning that the year is 1743, she tries to arrange travel back to the standing stones. Colum MacKenzie uses her ability as a healer as an excuse to detain her.

item.title: Manhattan
item.series: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love
item.description: Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

shorttext.p: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love

Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brianne and Jamie are taken prisoner.

shorttext.p: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brianne and Jamie are taken prisoner.

item.title: True Detective
item.description: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

shorttext.p: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

item.title: Agents of Shield
item.description: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of Hydra. Everyone tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing highly valuable information.

shorttext.p: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of Hydra. Everyone tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing highly valuable information.

item.title: Defiance
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 3: The Cord and the Ax
item.description: Irisa's terrifying black-outs escalate, driving a wedge of secrecy between her and a worried Nolan. Meanwhile, the Tarr family business thrives under Stahma's self-appointed direction while an increasingly suspicious Datak remains in jail.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 3: The Cord and the Ax

Irisa's terrifying black-outs escalate, driving a wedge of secrecy between her and a worried Nolan. Meanwhile, the Tarr family business thrives under Stahma's self-appointed direction while an increasingly suspicious Datak remains in jail.

item.title: Grimm
item.description: As a deadly crime spree begins to surface, a century-old urban legend takes shape in Portland's sewers and becomes Nick's latest case. Adalind meets Prince Viktor, who brings those responsible for his cousin Eric's demise to justice.

shorttext.p: As a deadly crime spree begins to surface, a century-old urban legend takes shape in Portland's sewers and becomes Nick's latest case. Adalind meets Prince Viktor, who brings those responsible for his cousin Eric's demise to justice.
